scripts.deploy: git branch -f deploy main && git push -f origin deploy
scripts.dev:gameServer: cross-env CLIENTORIGIN=http://localho.st:8000 PORT=3000 INTERNAL_PORT=3042 MAIN_SERVER_ADDRESS=localho.st:3011 node src/server/index.js develop
scripts.dev:mainServer: cross-env NODE_ENV=development CLIENTORIGIN=http://localho.st:8000 PORT=3010 INTERNAL_PORT=3011 node src/mainServer/index.js
scripts.dev:globalServer: cross-env NODE_ENV=development DEV_MAIN_ADDR=http://localho.st:3010 CLIENTORIGIN=http://localho.st:8000 PORT=3002 node src/globalServer/index.js
scripts.pro:globalServer: cross-env NODE_ENV=production CLIENTORIGIN=http://localho.st:8000 PORT=3002 node src/globalServer/index.js
scripts.dev:dynamodb:wipe: aws dynamodb delete-table --table-name Game --endpoint http://localhost:8042 --region localhost
scripts.dev: echo [warning] If dynamodb does not initialize quickly enough, gameServer and mainServer fail to start. && concurrently -n dynamodb,gameServer,mainServer,globalServer,serveSite,background "npm run dev:dynamodb" "npm run dev:gameServer" "npm run dev:mainServer" "npm run dev:globalServer" "npm run serveSite" "npm run dev:background"
